Name: DisBot (Moonlight)
Author: dm@xyzjesper.dev (https://github.com/DisBotDevelopment)
InstallScript:
#!/bin/bash

cd /mnt/server

apt update -y
apt install curl -y

curl -o run.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DisBotDevelopment/Content/refs/heads/main/selfhost/run.sh

chmod +x ./run.sh

echo "=========================================="
echo "       Using DisBot Hosted Image"
echo "=========================================="
echo ""
echo "--> Web: https://disbot.app"
echo "--> GitHub: https://github.com/DisBotDevelopment/DisBot-Bot"
echo "--> A xyz Solution by xyzjesper.dev"
echo ""

Variables.Description: DisBot Database URL (MongoDB) to run DisBot

Variables.DisplayName: Config Path of the DisBot Config
Variables.Description: Config Path of the DisBot Config
